comments.en:
Pieter-Jan Vandormael (pjv at skynet dot be) has started development of a driver for this printer. One can at least print in black and white now.

Please test the driver (also on the other Winwriters) and direct all bug reports, suggestions, and contributions to Pieter-Jan.

Consumables/Refills: 1 black and 1 color (CMY) cartridge
